Package codeLibrary

Class Algorithms

java.lang.Object
codeLibrary.Algorithms
public class Algorithms extends Object
The algorithm class uses generic type and provides functions such as finding maximum sorting.
Author:
Yuelong Li

    • yuelongSort

      public static double[] yuelongSort(double[] rgList)
      A special sorting algorithm that works the best when the list comprises of random yet evenly scattered digits. This method sorts things into ascending order. This method only takes in a double array for the sake of high testing speed
      Parameters:
      rgList - the original list stored as a double array
      Returns:
      the sorted list

    • yuelongSort

      public static List<Double> yuelongSort(List<Double> list)
      A special sorting algorithm that works the best when the list comprises of random yet evenly scattered digits This method sorts things into ascending order
      Parameters:
      list - The list to be sorted
      Returns:
      sorted the sorted list

    • getDerivative

      public static double getDerivative(Algorithms.DoubleFunction function, double input)
      Finds the derivative of a function at a certain point. Adjusts for max numerical accuracy by adjusting derivative step based on function value
      Parameters:
      function - function to be derived
      input - defines the point where the derivative is to be found
      Returns:
      the derivative of the function at input
